subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Attachments
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
Well, IU use google, and on the top of the e-mail page there is "attach
file", I just click that, browse to the file, and double click it. With
outlook, you just copy and paste.

 Frank-S
